dcterms:description: The Cross-Lingual Natural Language Inference Benchmark is used for classifying whether a hypothesis is entailed by, contradicted by, or neither with respect to a given premise.
dcterms:title: Cross-Lingual Natural Language Inference (XNLI)

dcterms:description: The Universal Dependencies Part-of-Speech corpus is used for structured prediction tasks, providing part-of-speech tags across multiple languages.
dcterms:title: Universal Dependencies Part-Of-Speech (UDPOS)
